example.eg: Eggs are kept warm through incubation.
Doctors couldn't detect the disease while it was in incubation.
The incubation period for chickenpox is 10 to 20 days.

dsense.name: incubation period
dsense.guideword: (time it takes an egg to hatch)

example.eg: Generally speaking, the smaller the bird, the shorter the incubation period for its eggs.
